snippet: Michelle and Curtis Urbina frantically traveled Friday from different directions to reunite with their daughter, a student at Sandy Hook Elementary.
abstract: Michelle and Curtis Urbina describe their frantic travel from different directions to reunite with their daughter, a student at Sandy Hook Elementary in Newtown, Conn, after hearing the news of the massacre; she was not harmed; couple say they had moved from New York City for the peace and safety of a small town.
lead_paragraph: Michelle and Curtis Urbina frantically traveled Friday from different directions to reunite with their daughter, a student at Sandy Hook Elementary.

headline.seo: After Newtown Shooting, Running and Hoping to Find a Child Safe
headline.main: Running and Hoping to Find a Child Safe
headline.print_headline: ‘There’s Been a Shooting’: Running and Hoping to Find a Child Safe
